title: Exploring wine yeast natural biodiversity to select strains with enological traits adapted to climate change
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Joana P. Guedes, Tiago Vidal Cardoso, Ticiana Fernandes, Filipa Mendes, M. Margarida Baleiras-Couto, Filomena L. Duarte, Maria João Sousa, Ricardo Franco-Duarte, Susana R. Chaves, Manuela Côrte-Real
